message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $9,500. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth the investment.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9,200?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer the product to you for $9,350. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth the investment.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9,250?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer the product to you for $9,400. This is as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to go down to $9,200?

I've already gone as low as I can, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower. I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. I can offer the product to you for $9,650. This is my final offer.

I understand that you've already gone as low as you can, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers, but I can only go up to $9,450. This is my final offer.
